captions.text: Oh, hey there. BYE. OH no no no. Oh no. Oh god
If i'ts not I'm gonna be pissed...
OH! Oh is that what I wanted to grab?
OH! Here I thought I wanted the saw!
Alright! Coming out of Markiplier's demise
Why was that even a question? - I don't know! [LAUGHING]
Uh oh, is he an alien?
That sounds like... - Are you sure we don't have an alien down here?
I told you that if I was the traitor I would, I would forgo traitorous activities so we could all...
Tossing around the file boxes like loser...
Wandering around aimlessly like a loser...
Looking around confused like a loser...
Minx didn't actually kill me, but god you guys went for it.
I can't move! Kill me Yami! Kill me! KILL ME!
Stop moving your hands it's very creepy!
I'm gonna perform surgery on YOU!
I don't care what you say in return!
Look at him! Look at the doggy!
Hey doggy! Whatcha doin over there?
Alright. I'll keep a lookout over here! I'll make the eagle sound if I see anyone again!
What's the eagle sound sound like?
No, that was just a test of the eagle system. -Don't use the eagle sound if you don't see them!
No, I don't wanna go in there! I'm staying..... -Come on, come on.
I'm not doing it! I'm NOT doing it! -Come on, come on.
Come on Yami! -Fuck it! Fine I'll do it!
Ok, come on. Here we go!
AAAAAH it's her! AAAH she's down here! Where'd she go?
I..I'm ready. I'm ready! I'm ready baby!
No wait, wait, wait, wait! In 3..2..1...
I like the extra drip at the end.
[YELLING] This is..this is really fun! Wade is....
I'm right here, Mark! I can see you. Running around in circles....
Aaaah you're in this room, aren't you? You're in this room!
I swear to god you're in this room!
Aaaah ostrich facts! -WHY? What is going on?
Zombie ported Wade... OH MY GOD! BOB LOOK UP!
I will have you know it's very uncomfortable in here.
But I'm still surr.....OH it's TNT now!
I just want this to be a nice, normal operation with...
This has been Markiplier Highlights. Thanks for watching!
If you enjoyed this video and you'd like to see more, then please, leave a like to let me know!
Links to all the videos are available in the description below so check em out!
And if you have a video that you wanna see in a highlights reel later, let me know in the comments below!
Thanks again for watching and as always I will SEE YOU in the next video!
